changelog: Perbaikan bug minor pada tampilan overlay
update_info.update_message: Versi baru tersedia dengan fitur menarik dan peningkatan performa. Harap perbarui aplikasi Anda untuk pengalaman terbaik.

info_dialog.title: Selamat Datang di FF ToolsPro+
info_dialog.message:
Activate the Game Booster before playing for maximum performance.
Don’t forget to try the latest features in the Overlay menu:

- Crosshair+
- Sensitivity & Resolution
- Boost Performance
- Headtrick Enhancer

To disable the overlay, long-press the minimize button.
Join our WhatsApp group: Click here
